head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MEEHAN, JANE C.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MEEHAN, JANE C.

block.p: MEEHAN-Jane C. On September 29, 2000, at age 93. Beloved sister of the late Marion, Jack, Charles and Henry Meehan and Georgette Livingston. Loving aunt of 17 nieces and nephews and 20 grandnieces and nephews. Friends may call at The Abbey, 1076 Madison Ave. at 81st St., Sunday, 2-6 PM, with funeral mass at St. Thomas More Church, 65 East 89th St., Monday, October 2, 10 AM. Interment to follow at Gate of Heaven Cemetery.
